forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 7C. Winds W at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm. Higher wind gusts possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 44F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch. Higher wind gusts possible.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low around 0C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 32F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning light rain. High 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with light rain in the morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High around 45F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 2C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 34F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 44F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 4C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 38F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 7C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 43F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 3C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 37F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 42F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Periods of light rain early. Low around 0C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with light rain early. Low 32F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High 43F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 33F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 44F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 34F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.
